ygData.subject: RE: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... And what else do clerics do?  More options, and you list only one. Clerics are healers, buffers, stunners, undead nukers, nukers in that order.  They don t
ygData.messageBody:
> Actually, clerics have more options than just healing. So do wizards (though
> to a smaller extent)
> Clerics have Quite good stuns that sometimes it is worth taking another look
> at.

And what else do clerics do? More options, and you list only one.

Clerics are healers, buffers, stunners, undead nukers, nukers in that
order. They don't do much more, and in fact I prefer they not blast
anything. And I prefer paladins do the stunning. We are talking about
grouping, not solo play.

Wizards do more? Thats a joke. They are snowflake button pressers
and gaters. Yeah i've seen a wizard stun or root something but rarely
in a well balanced group. mumble: wizards have more... <chuckle>.

Enchanters and Bards are the most situation adapative classes and
that makes them the hardest to teach correct gameplay. All the
other classes are one or two tracked minded with very little
strategy based thinking.

Harmonic.
